items.title: This chart shows why upward pressure on long-term Treasury yields matters to borrowers and stocks
items.description: If the 10-year Treasury yield reaches or exceeds 4.5%, it could be a challenge to the market, says BNY

items.title: Investors are making a big bet on Big Tech’s AI spending. They’re about to learn if it paid off.
items.description: A reality check is coming as the Magnificent Seven report earnings. Here’s what to watch.

items.title: ‘I feel like this does us a disservice’: My brother wants his $1 million inheritance in advance. Should he pay interest?
items.description: “The total value of our family trust is $4 million.”

items.title: ‘They upset me every time I see them’: How long do I keep my mother’s IRS and medical records? She died 4 years ago.
items.description: “Her low income did not require her to file taxes, and once she moved to the care facility, I got her on Medi-Cal.”

items.title: This chart tracks the ‘single greatest predictor’ of stock-market returns — it’s never done this before
items.description: Individual stock ownership is a contrarian indicator. It’s flashing a warning.
